content: this wee little gnome works up quickly with minimal sewing nose only and uses very little yarn using the hook and yarn suggested he stands approximately 3 1/2 tall stitches used in this pattern - magic_ring magic_ring chain - chain st s stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet flo front loop only blo back loop only single_crochet-increase increase work 2 single_crochet in the same space half_double_crochet-increase increase work 2 half_double_crochet in the same space double_crochet-increase increase work 2 double crochet in the same space decrease decrease using the invisible method pick up the flo of next 2 sts yarn over & pull through 2 loops
